00033 #pragma once
00034 
00035 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00036 #include <thrust/iterator/iterator_facade.h>
00037 #include <thrust/detail/use_default.h>
00038 #include <thrust/iterator/detail/iterator_adaptor_base.h>
00039 
00040 namespace thrust
00041 {
00042 
00043 namespace experimental
00044 {
00045 
00046 template <
00047       typename Derived
00048     , typename Base
00049     , typename Pointer
00050     // XXX nvcc can't handle these defaults at the moment
00051     //, typename Value                = use_default
00052     //, typename CategoryOrSystem      = use_default
00053     //, typename CategoryOrTraversal  = use_default
00054     //, typename Reference            = use_default
00055     //, typename Difference           = use_default
00056     , typename Value
00057     , typename System
00058     , typename Traversal
00059     , typename Reference
00060     , typename Difference = use_default
00061   >
00062   class iterator_adaptor:
00063     public detail::iterator_adaptor_base<
00064       Derived, Base, Pointer, Value, System, Traversal, Reference, Difference
00065     >::type
00066 {
00067     friend class iterator_core_access;
00068 
00069   protected:
00070     typedef typename detail::iterator_adaptor_base<
00071         Derived, Base, Pointer, Value, System, Traversal, Reference, Difference
00072     >::type super_t;
00073   
00074   public:
00075     __host__ __device__
00076     iterator_adaptor(){}
00077 
00078     __host__ __device__
00079     explicit iterator_adaptor(Base const& iter)
00080       : m_iterator(iter)
00081     {}
00082 
00083     typedef Base       base_type;
00084     // XXX BUG: why do we have to declare this here?  it's supposed to be published in super_t
00085     typedef typename super_t::reference reference;
00086     // XXX BUG: why do we have to declare this here?  it's supposed to be published in super_t
00087     typedef typename super_t::difference_type difference_type;
00088 
00089     __host__ __device__
00090     Base const& base() const
00091     { return m_iterator; }
00092 
00093   protected:
00094     typedef iterator_adaptor iterator_adaptor_;
00095 
00096     __host__ __device__
00097     Base const& base_reference() const
00098     { return m_iterator; }
00099 
00100     __host__ __device__
00101     Base& base_reference()
00102     { return m_iterator; }
00103 
00104   private: // Core iterator interface for iterator_facade
00105 
00106     __host__ __device__
00107     typename iterator_adaptor::reference dereference() const
00108     { return *m_iterator; }
00109 
00110     template<typename OtherDerived, typename OtherIterator, typename P, typename V, typename S, typename T, typename R, typename D>
00111     __host__ __device__
00112     bool equal(iterator_adaptor<OtherDerived, OtherIterator, P, V, S, T, R, D> const& x) const
00113     { return m_iterator == x.base(); }
00114 
00115     __host__ __device__
00116     void advance(typename iterator_adaptor::difference_type n)
00117     {
00118       // XXX statically assert on random_access_traversal_tag
00119       m_iterator += n;
00120     }
00121 
00122     __host__ __device__
00123     void increment()
00124     { ++m_iterator; }
00125 
00126     __host__ __device__
00127     void decrement()
00128     {
00129       // XXX statically assert on bidirectional_traversal_tag
00130       --m_iterator;
00131     }
00132 
00133     template<typename OtherDerived, typename OtherIterator, typename P, typename V, typename S, typename T, typename R, typename D>
00134     __host__ __device__
00135     typename iterator_adaptor::difference_type distance_to(iterator_adaptor<OtherDerived, OtherIterator, P, V, S, T, R, D> const& y) const
00136     { return y.base() - m_iterator; }
00137 
00138   private:
00139     Base m_iterator; // exposition only
00140 }; // end iterator_adaptor
00141 
00142 } // end experimental
00143 
00144 } // end thrust
